Docs.summary: Base class for game-appropriate pseudo-random number generators. Do not use for cryptographic or security purposes.

remarks.para: GameplayKit provides a number of pseudo-random number generators with a common interface for retrieving randomly-valued booleans, integers, and floats. There are also functions that shuffle properly. A T:GameKit.GKRandomSource instance can be used to construct a T:GameKit.GKRandomDistribution instance with a high-quality uniform, Gaussian, or shuffled distribution. functions are not appropriate for use in cryptographic or security scenarios.
